Question 52 
 
 
 
Sensors & Transducers (MCQ)
Input-output characteristic of a temperature sensor is exponential for a  
 
 
[1 Mark]
 
 
(A) Mercury thermometer  
 
(B) Resistive temperature device (RTD) 
 
(C) Thermistor 
 
 
(D) Thermocouple 
Ans. 
C 
Sol. 
Input-output characteristics is exponential for thermistor. 
 
Hence, the correct option is (C).
